welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Katsushika-ku, where traditional Japanese charm meets modern city life. Explore our beautiful parks, historic temples, and vibrant culture, and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-logging in after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights, with a wide range of amenities and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international and domestic flights, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 3 hours.
